```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Learn more about creating blogs with Radix at:
# https://rstudio.github.io/radix/blog.html

```

I recently rebuilt my blog in `distill`, as opposed to `Blogdown`, mainly as a way to escape Hugo-dependency.

If you are interested in building your own blog via R, .rmd, and RStudio - check out this [link](https://rstudio.github.io/radix/blog.html) on how to do so in the Radix format.
